title: Vanek, Wild spoil Tortorella's debut with Blue Jackets
text:
Facebook Email Twitter Google+ LinkedIn Pinterest Vanek, Wild spoil Tortorella's debut with Blue Jackets Thomas Vanek scored the go-ahead goal in the second period and the Minnesota Wild beat Columbus 3-2 on Thursday night, pushing the Blue Jackets to 0-8-0 and spoiling John Tortorella's debut. Post to Facebook Vanek, Wild spoil Tortorella's debut with Blue Jackets Thomas Vanek scored the go-ahead goal in the second period and the Minnesota Wild beat Columbus 3-2 on Thursday night, pushing the Blue Jackets to 0-8-0 and spoiling John Tortorella's debut.  //www.kare11.com/story/sports/nhl/wild/2015/10/22/vanek-wild-spoil-tortorellas-debut-with-blue-jackets/74439008/   Join the Conversation To   Vanek, Wild spoil Tortorella's debut with Blue Jackets Associated Press, Associated Press 11:13 p.m. EDT October 22, 2015 Oct 22, 2015; Saint Paul, MN, USA; Minnesota Wild forward Thomas Vanek (26) scores on Columbus Blue Jackets goalie Sergei Bobrovsky (72) during the second period at Xcel Energy Center. (Photo: Marilyn Indahl-USA TODAY Sports) CONNECT 1 TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
ST. PAUL, Minn. (AP) - Thomas Vanek scored the go-ahead goal in the second period and the Minnesota Wild beat Columbus 3-2 on Thursday night, pushing the Blue Jackets to 0-8-0 and spoiling John Tortorella's debut. 
The Blue Jackets' start is the worst season-opening regulation losing streak in the NHL since the New York Rangers started 0-11-0 in 1943-44. Tortorella took over as coach Wednesday after Todd Richards was fired. 
Zach Parise tied for the league lead with his sixth goal 5 minutes in. After Alexander Wennberg and Brandon Dubinsky countered for Columbus, Nino Niederreiter tied it and Vanek scored the winner with 8:48 left in the second with his third goal of the season. 
Devan Dubnyk made 27 saves for his fourth win in five games this season. 
Sergei Bobrovsky made 20 saves for the Blue Jackets. Read or Share this story: http://www.kare11.com/story/sports/nhl/wild/2015/10/22/vanek-wild-spoil-tortorellas-debut-with-blue-jackets/74439008/ TOP VIDEOS
